definition: to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

sentences.english: You are the way and the wayfarers.
sentences.chinese: 你们是道路，也是行路者。

sentences.english: But a certain Samaritan, as he journeyed, came where he was: and when he saw him, he had compassion on him
sentences.chinese: 惟有一个撒玛利亚人，行路来到那里。

sentences.english: Speak, ye that ride on white asses, ye that sit in judgment, and walk by the way.
sentences.chinese: 骑白驴的，坐绣花毯子的，行路的，你们都当传扬。

sentences.english: There are as many roads to the sttainment of wisdom and goodness as there are people who undertake to waik them.
sentences.chinese: 世间有多少行路者，通往善良与智慧的途径就有多少。

sentences.english: Rivers to the sea finite date, no road wheel is when the hoof.
sentences.chinese: 江河到海有穷日，轮蹄行路无已时。

sentences.english: Traveller, we are helpless to keep you. We have only our tears.
sentences.chinese: 行路人，我们没有希看留住你，我们只有眼泪。

sentences.english: We always pick up sth and throw away sth on our way.
sentences.chinese: 行路过程中总会不断地捡到和丢掉一些东西。

sentences.english: And as he journeyed, he came to the hill country of Ephraim to the house of Micah.
sentences.chinese: 行路的时候，到了以法莲山地，走到米迦的家。

sentences.english: Good  company on the road is the shortest cut.
In AD 2007, rough roads at Daming Palace Relics Site after raining.
sentences.chinese: 公元2007年，雨后的大明宫遗址区，行路艰难。

sentences.english: Yet who also is aggrieved and outraged?
sentences.chinese: 你们是道路，也是行路者。

definition: to hasten on with one's journey/to hurry on
to pass over mountains ridges (idiom); fig. hardships of the journey
potholed and bumpy road (idiom); fig. full of disappointment and dashed hopes
